amendment.description: To require a report on any relationships between terrorist organizations based in Colombia and foreign governments and organizations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3279 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3279 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980) To require a report on any relationships between terrorist organizations based in Colombia and foreign governments and organizations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3279 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3279 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Nelson FL.
